name: You Want To HUG!
description:
it's a top-down game where you move your character to avoid enemies but every time your character dies he becomes stronger and when your character's health bar reaches 100% you'll get the ability to attack. it also has a survival mode for attacking and surviving.

PS. it started as a game Jam game with the title progress through failure. but time restraints prevented me from finishing in time I took a couple extra days to polish it up and work out a few bugs so it would better match to my original vision
